title: Spanish Inquisition

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Each night you may use one of your chief weapons
- Suprise another player, roleblocking them
- Scare another player, Blackmailing them
- Use your ruthless efficiency to kill another player
- Dedicate yourself to the pope for a night, preventing any deaths from happening
Each has a cooldown of 3 nights.

desc:
Post 1273
*"NO ONE EXPECTS THE SPANISH INQUISITION!"*
